text.textblock: Determination of net worth to REA debt ratio.
A borrower's ratio of net worth to REA debt will be determined as set forth in ยง1717.860(b).
The applicable requirements and controls exempted by 7 CFR 1710.7(c) are also exempted with respect to concurrent supplemental loans.

All requirements and controls applicable to concurrent supplemental financing set forth in this subpart and other REA regulations that are not specifically exempted by 7 CFR 1710.7(c) are not exempted and shall continue to apply according to their terms. These include, but are not limited to:
(1) The applicable requirements listed in 7 CFR 1710.7(d); and
(2) The requirements set forth in ยง1717.901(a) when a borrower requests early approval of a lien accommodation.

If a borrower meets the requirements of this section, upon receipt of a complete application REA will promptly notify the borrower and lender in writing that the lien accommodation has been approved subject to the conditions set forth in paragraph (a) of this section.
